text: James Allen Farley (born October 10, 1951) is an American politician. He is a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from the 15th District, serving since 2010. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:Alabama Republicans Category:People from Bessemer, Alabama Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1951 births
title: Allen Farley
